steps.title: Learn How to Draw Princess Daisy.
steps.content: Learn How to Draw Princess Daisy .

steps.title: Draw an oval with a bit flattened base and flattened sides.
steps.content: Draw an oval with a bit flattened base and flattened sides.

steps.title: Draw a circle just below the oval leaving a narrow gap.
steps.content: Draw a circle just below the oval leaving a narrow gap.

steps.title: Attach four irregular rectangles to the circle, one on either side for the hands and two at the bottom for the legs.
steps.content: Attach four irregular rectangles to the circle, one on either side for the hands and two at the bottom for the legs.

steps.title: Attach further ovals at the wrists and hang down circles overlapping the ovals.
steps.content: Attach further ovals at the wrists and hang down circles overlapping the ovals. Draw egg-shaped ovals at the bottom for the shoes of the character.

steps.title: Now get back to the head and draw an overlapping circle for the cap.
steps.content: Now get back to the head and draw an overlapping circle for the cap. Draw two protruding ovals on either side of the head for the ears.

steps.title: Draw a curved line joining the roof of the ears for the cap-end.
steps.content: Draw a curved line joining the roof of the ears for the cap-end. Also, draw a tapered oval for the nose between the ears.

steps.title: Draw a couple of ovals with pupils for the eyes and draw a curved line each over the eyes for the eyebrows, a rounded curved rectangle for the moustache overlapping the nose.
steps.content: Draw a couple of ovals with pupils for the eyes and draw a curved line each over the eyes for the eyebrows, a rounded curved rectangle for the moustache overlapping the nose.

steps.title: Add details to the head by drawing a circle on the cap for the 'M', sideburn on either side and a small curved line just below the moustache for the mouth.
steps.content: Add details to the head by drawing a circle on the cap for the 'M', sideburn on either side and a small curved line just below the moustache for the mouth. Also, hang two rectangles from the shoulders.

steps.title: Based on the guidelines, draw details on the entire figure to complete the drawing part.
steps.content: Based on the guidelines, draw details on the entire figure to complete the drawing part.

steps.title: Clean-up all the guide strokes and color the drawing.
steps.content: Clean-up all the guide strokes and color the drawing.
